example.eg: Does that machine function as it is supposed to?
example.egtrans: 那台机器运转是否正常？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 运行, 运转, 工作

example.eg: Sometimes a screwdriver can function as a chisel.
example.egtrans: 有时螺丝刀可用作凿子。

example.eg: A tool should only be used for its intended function.
example.egtrans: 工具只能按照其既定用途来使用。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 功能, 用途, 目的

example.eg: He was pronounced dead when brain function ceased.
The Mayor presided at the function.
It was the function of the inspector to check the tickets.
Which mathematical function do you think will fit the data?
The completion date is a function of time and weather.
I was the oldest of the 12 children so when our parents died I had to function as the head of the family.

dsense.name: function key
dsense.guideword: (button on computer keyboard) (电脑键盘上的)

example.eg: The function keys are always numbered F1, F2, F3, etc.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 活动会议室, 宴会厅
